ModMetaData.name: RBSE Back to Basics
ModMetaData.author: Bishop
ModMetaData.description:
Taking Rah's Bionics and Surgery Expansion back to the basics! I love Rah. But I also love stupid pawns. And stupid pawns need prostheses, too!
This mod expands on RBSE by creating an early research project which allows pawns to craft basic prostheses at a smithy. Basic prostheses are worse than simple, but they make stupid pawns happy!
Also, the research required for installing all prostheses will be reduced by 1 level. Just because your stupid pawns don't quite know how to make a bionic arm, just yet, doesn't mean they won't try installing one!
